plan.title: Update Parcel Type Definition
plan.description: Add 'delivered_at' field to the Parcel type definition to support the new column in the table.
rationale: The API response needs to include the 'delivered_at' field, which requires updating the type definition.
implementationChecklist: Add 'delivered_at: string' to the Parcel type definition.
doneWhen: The Parcel type includes the 'delivered_at' field.

plan.title: Update Parcel API to Include 'Delivered At' Field
plan.description: Modify the parcelAPI service to ensure the 'delivered_at' field is included in the parcel response.
rationale: The API must provide the 'delivered_at' data for the UI to display it.
implementationChecklist: Ensure the API endpoint response includes 'delivered_at'.
Update any relevant data transformation logic.
doneWhen: The API response includes the 'delivered_at' field.

plan.title: Add 'Delivered At' Column to Parcels Page
plan.description: Modify the Parcels page to display the new 'Delivered At' column in the table, ensuring it is visible by default.
rationale: The UI needs to display the new 'Delivered At' column as specified in the PRD.
implementationChecklist: Add a new column for 'Delivered At' in the table.
Ensure the column is visible by default.
Format the date as 'DD MMM YYYY, hh:mm A'.
Display 'Not Delivered' if the delivery date is not available.
doneWhen: The 'Delivered At' column is visible and correctly formatted on the Parcels page.

plan.title: Update Table Renderer for New Column
plan.description: Modify the TableRenderer component to handle the new 'Delivered At' column, including sorting functionality.
rationale: The TableRenderer needs to support rendering and sorting the new column.
implementationChecklist: Update rendering logic to include 'Delivered At' column.
Implement sorting functionality for the new column.
doneWhen: The TableRenderer can render and sort the 'Delivered At' column.

plan.title: Ensure UI Components Support New Column
plan.description: Verify and update any UI components that interact with the table to support the new 'Delivered At' column.
rationale: Ensure all UI components are compatible with the new column addition.
implementationChecklist: Check if any UI components need updates to support the new column.
Make necessary adjustments to ensure compatibility.
doneWhen: All relevant UI components support the 'Delivered At' column.

plan.title: Add Tests for 'Delivered At' Column Functionality
plan.description: Create or update tests to cover the new 'Delivered At' column functionality, including visibility, sorting, and formatting.
rationale: Testing is needed to ensure the new column behaves as expected and does not break existing functionality.
implementationChecklist: Write tests to verify the 'Delivered At' column is visible by default.
Test the sorting functionality of the new column.
Check the date formatting and 'Not Delivered' display logic.
doneWhen: Tests are passing and cover all aspects of the 'Delivered At' column functionality.

acceptanceCriteria: All TypeScript compilation errors are resolved (tsc exits 0)
All existing tests continue to pass after changes
